rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must be "CantAnswer", written exactly as shown and must not include any additional characters, spaces, or punctuation.
input: sentence: The cat sat on the xyz123., word: xyz123
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, "FW", which is present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags in the provided description. The output does not include extraneous information and seems to adhere to the requirement of returning just the tag.
OK
